import React from 'react' import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography, ButtonBase } from '@mui/material'; import { ThumbUp, Delete, MoreHoriz } from "@mui/icons-material" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { deletePost, likePost } from "../actions/Veri" import moment from "moment" import "moment/locale/tr" const Post = ({ data, setCurrentId }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{data.creator} {moment(data.creator).fromNow()}
{data.tags.map(tag => `#${tag} `)} {data.title} {data.message}
) } export default Post
